selected_links.title: Do I need planning permission? - Rushmoor Borough Council
strengths: Provides helpful guidance on whether you need planning permission for various home improvements
Includes common examples such as porches, extensions, solar panels, fences, trees and hedges
selected_links.reasoning: This resource directly addresses the search query and provides detailed information about when planning permission is required for various home improvements. It includes relevant examples that match common customer inquiries.
